name: Banana Whip (Sugar-Free)
author: Charlotte Hooper

ingredients.name: pkg. (4 serving size) Sugar Free JELL-O, any flavor
c. cold whole milk Ice cubes

instructions: Combine gelatin and boiling water in a blender. Blend until dissolved, about 30 seconds. Add milk and ice cubes to make 1 1/4 cups. Stir in blender until partially melted. Add banana slices; blend until smooth. Only 45 calories per serving.
